edu.cmu.commons.data.dao.jpa

public abstract class JPADao<E,I>
extends Object
implements Dao<E,I>

Dao implementation which delegates to an EntityManager.

hazen

removeAll

public void removeAll()
Delegates to removeAllOneByOne(). Override and delegate to removeAllBulkDelete() if possible.

Specified by:
removeAll in interface Dao<E,I>

removeAllOneByOne

protected void removeAllOneByOne()
Work around for removeAll() for those Entity types containing ElementCollection fields.

removeAllBulkDelete

protected void removeAllBulkDelete()
This DOES NOT WORK when entity class contains an ElementCollection and no CASCADE ON DELETE action has been specified on the CollectionTable's foreign key constraint. Hibernate's DDL generation isn't smart enough to do this (as of 3.6.0.RC2), so it must be done manually if you want to use this method. Otherwise, you should use removeAllOneByOne().

See Also:
HHH-5529, HHH-5528, HHH-695

iterator

public Iterator<E> iterator()
Specified by:
iterator in interface Iterable<E>

select

protected javax.persistence.TypedQuery<E> select(String querySuffix,
                                                 Object... parameters)
Syntactic sugar for creation of JPQL "SELECT e FROM <E> e ..." queries. Parameter placeholders within query must correspond to integer indices (1-based) of specified parameter values. For instance, find("WHERE e.first = ?1 AND e.last = ?1", "Jo") selects all E instances whose first and last properties are equal to the String "Jo".

Parameters:
querySuffix - suffix to append to "SELECT e FROM <E> e ".
parameters - zero or more values to assign to named parameters within querySuffix.
Returns:
JPQL select where query.

selectWhere

protected javax.persistence.TypedQuery<E> selectWhere(String querySuffix,
                                                      Object... parameters)
Syntactic sugar for creation of JPQL "FROM <E> WHERE ..." queries. Parameter placeholders within query must correspond to integer indices (1-based) of specified parameter values. For instance, find("first = ?1 AND last = ?1", "Jo") selects all E instances whose first and last properties are equal to the String "Jo".

Parameters:
querySuffix - suffix to append to "FROM <E> WHERE ".
parameters - zero or more values to assign to named parameters within querySuffix.
Returns:
JPQL select where query.

find

protected List<E> find(String querySuffix,
                       Object... parameters)
Executes query returned by a call to select(String, Object...).

Parameters:
querySuffix - suffix to append to "SELECT e FROM <E> e ".
parameters - zero or more values to assign to named parameters within querySuffix.
Returns:
all matching entities of type E.

get

protected E get(String querySuffix,
                Object... parameters)
Executes query returned by a call to select(String, Object...).

Parameters:
querySuffix - suffix to append to "SELECT e FROM <E> e ".
parameters - zero or more values to assign to named parameters within querySuffix.
Returns:
the single matching entity of type E, or null if no such entity exists.
